tiles.name: Peak of Whispers
tiles.description: The tallest peak, shrouded in mist, rumored to hold ancient secrets and a hidden cave entrance. The air crackles with barely contained magic.

tiles.name: Zephyr's Perch
tiles.description: A rocky outcrop where the legendary Zephyr has set up his laboratory, brimming with alchemical ingredients and half-finished inventions. The area has a faint, sweet smell.

tiles.name: The Stone Library
tiles.description: A hidden cave within the mountain. Contains countless scrolls and maps detailing long-lost knowledge.

tiles.name: Echoing Caverns
tiles.description: A network of tunnels carved into the mountain, resonating with the sounds of underground rivers. Contains many rocky areas

tiles.name: Whispering Valley
tiles.description: A narrow valley that cuts through the mountain range. The valley floor is lush and full of rivers.

tiles.name: The Lightning Peaks
tiles.description: The highest peaks struck by lightning with a strange magical energy. The tops of the peaks glow with an inner light.

tiles.name: The Alchemist's Den
tiles.description: A rocky area that houses a makeshift laboratory. Evidence of experiments past can be found everywhere.

tiles.name: Sunken River
tiles.description: The river flows swiftly here, disappearing into the shadows of the mountain.

tiles.name: Hidden Passageway
tiles.description: A winding path carved into the mountain.
